explainability.path_to_improvement: Document how explanations are provided to users affected by AI decisions.

external_accountability.findings: The report references the engagement of third-party assessors for cybersecurity capability maturity assessments. These assessments are reviewed by the Audit Committee, highlighting external accountability.

relevant_sources.summary: This SEC Form 10-K annual report provides evidence for **governance**, **oversight**, and **external accountability**. The report details the Cybersecurity Leadership Committee (CLC) as a named body responsible for managing cybersecurity risks, with regular meetings and reporting demonstrating operational governance and oversight. Furthermore, the mention of AI and its legal implications suggests a need for policy considerations and governance around new technologies, while the engagement of third-party assessors for cybersecurity capability maturity assessments, reviewed by the Audit Committee, highlights external accountability.
relevant_sources.title: Comcast Form 10-K Annual Report 2024

fairness.path_to_improvement: Document bias testing procedures or vendor AI fairness requirements.

governance.findings: The Governance & Corporate Responsibility Committee's oversight responsibilities include reviewing AI and data governance matters and the incorporation of AI tools. Additionally, the Cybersecurity Leadership Committee (CLC) is detailed as a body responsible for managing cybersecurity risks, with regular meetings and reporting demonstrating operational governance. The report also references a need for policy considerations and governance around new technologies like AI due to legal implications.

relevant_sources.summary: This proxy statement provides evidence for the **governance** and **privacy** pillars of responsible AI. It supports the governance pillar by detailing the oversight responsibilities of the Governance & Corporate Responsibility Committee, which includes reviewing AI and data governance matters and the incorporation of AI tools. The document also supports the privacy pillar by mentioning privacy in the context of AI and data governance, indicating areas of compliance.
relevant_sources.title: Comcast DEF 14A 2025 Proxy Statement

transparency.path_to_improvement: Document AI systems in use, including vendor/third-party AI tools.

summary.overall_findings: Comcast's SEC Form 10-K details the Cybersecurity Leadership Committee (CLC) as a named body responsible for managing cybersecurity risks, demonstrating operational oversight. Additionally, the proxy statement outlines the Governance & Corporate Responsibility Committee's oversight responsibilities, including reviewing AI and data governance matters, contributing to the 4 of 7 evaluated responsible AI pillars with documented evidence. Privacy is addressed at the policy level, with the proxy statement referencing privacy in the context of AI and data governance and indicating areas of compliance, based on a review of 15 publicly available sources. No qualifying public evidence was found for transparency, fairness, and 1 additional pillar.
